```{r}
listings = read_csv("/Users/ashleykim/Documents/Y4 2022-2023/Spring 2023/DS 4002/Data/listings.csv")

listings <- listings[,-c(3,4,5,7,8,11,13:18)]

colnames(listings)[1] ="listing_id"
```

```{r}
reviews = read_csv("/Users/ashleykim/Documents/Y4 2022-2023/Spring 2023/DS 4002/Data/reviews.csv")
```

```{r}
airbnb <- merge(reviews,listings,by="listing_id")
```

```{r}
library(stringr)

airbnb_filtered <- airbnb %>% 
    filter(str_detect(comments, '\\b(clean|quiet|safe|spacious|responsive|comfortable|accomodating|convenient)\\b'))
```

```{r}
write.csv(airbnb, "/Users/ashleykim/Documents/Y4 2022-2023/Spring 2023/DS 4002/Data/airbnb.csv", row.names=FALSE)
```
